name: Blade's Point
description:
AUDIO MIGHT BE VERY LOUD, SET LOW BEFORE STARTING!!!
CONTROLS:

Tap Space to Stab
Hold Space and let go to do a Guard Break
Don't press Space to block specifc attacks

Advance to next round by pressing space when the drums stop playing
Reset after death by pressing space. Restart the Game by pressing R

Can you beat round 10? If so, congrats!

Enemy Info (Use if you can't get past specific enemies))

Dog (Low Barking Enemy): Stab the dogs when they jump up to  bite you. Guard breaking them throws them backwards in the queue

Soldier (Tall Sword Swinging Enemy): Don't press anything to block their attacks, then stab them for the hit. They require two stabs to kill

Heart Tank (Large... Heart Tank Enemy): Guard break their shield and then stab them in the heart. Requires three stabs to kill.

Lil PostMortem: Glad I got everything I could in here, but it does feel like there's so much room to grow. From building your own tracks, randomizing enemy layouts, special moves and different locations. It ended up a little less musical than I wanted, but I hope it still feels rhythmic.
